snippet.title: Letters to The Metro Trailer
snippet.description:
In the middle of a lonely night, the man remembers his childhood... 

Letters To The Metro is a psychological stairway to the past. A short narrative-driven retro-style exploration game with few puzzles and old-school fixed camera.
